# representedObject

**Instance Property**

The object represented by the cell.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var representedObject: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to link the cell an appropriate object. For example, in a pop-up list of color names, the represented object of each cell could be the appropriate [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor] object.

### Special Considerations

When you copy an `NSCell` object, the value of this property is set to `nil` in the copy.

## Related Documentation

- **objectValue**: The cell’s value as an Objective-C object.
